original_text: This is also a terrible thing to happen. People leave this earth with nothing, as they came into it with nothing. All their hard work has been useless, like someone who tries to catch the wind. This is also a terrible thing to happen. People leave this earth with nothing, as they came into it with nothing. All their hard work has been useless, like someone who tries to catch the wind. This is also a terrible thing to happen.
korean_text: 이것도 큰 불행이라 어떻게 왔든지 그대로 가리니 바람을 잡는 수고가 그에게 무엇이 유익하랴

sentences.original_text: This is also a terrible thing to happen.
People leave this earth with nothing,
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 아무것도 없이 이 땅을 떠나며,

sentences.original_text: as they came into it with nothing.
sentences.korean_translation: 아무것도 없이 이 땅에 들어온 것처럼.

sentences.original_text: All their hard work has been useless,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 모든 수고는 헛된 것이 되었으며,

sentences.original_text: like someone who tries to catch the wind.
This is also a terrible thing to happen.
People leave this earth with nothing,
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 아무것도 없이 이 땅을 떠나며,

sentences.original_text: as they came into it with nothing.
sentences.korean_translation: 아무것도 없이 이 땅에 들어온 것처럼.

sentences.original_text: All their hard work has been useless,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 모든 수고는 헛된 것이 되었으며,

sentences.original_text: like someone who tries to catch the wind.
This is also a terrible thing to happen.
